From left to right, [[Angelina Armani]], [[Alektra Blue]], [[Nina Hartley]], [[Jessica Drake]]]] '''The X-Rated Critics Organization''' ('''XRCO''') is a group of writers and editors from the [[adult entertainment]] industry who each year present awards in recognition of achievement within the industry. The organization was founded in 1984,<ref>[http://www.avn.com/index.cfm?objectid=1F0F2AAA-EAEC-A1A3-E596FD91DAACD603 XRCO Announces 2008 Awards Nominees, by David Sullivan AVN Feb 15, 2008]</ref> consisting of writers from [[Los Angeles]], [[New York City]] and [[Philadelphia]]. [[Jim Holliday]], AVN Award winning producer and historian, is considered the founding father of the X-Rated Critics Organization.<ref>[http://www.avn.com/index.cfm?objectId=EDA03C01-1372-4B41-C425A5AEECFDEBA9 Jim Holliday Passes Away, AVN By Tim Connelly Dec 16, 2004]</ref> The first [[XRCO Awards]] were presented in [[Hollywood]] on February 14, 1985. Until 1991, the awards were presented on [[Valentine's Day]] each year. Its members include writers from a wide range of adult publications and Internet sites. Many members work full time at this occupation; some have university degrees with emphasis on Film Criticism. [http://www.bwdl.net/XRCO-2/xrcomembers.htm Current list of XRCO Members]. There are currently 27 award categories, including the [[XRCO Hall of Fame]], which honor the achievements of performers, directors and movies.<ref>[http://www.signonsandiego.com/news/features/20061210-9999-lz1a10prize.html San Diego Union Tribune, December 10, 2006]</ref> XRCO's original Chairman, Jared Rutter, stepped down in 2004 and is now recognized as an "Honorary Chairman". The current co-Chairmen are "Dirty Bob" Krotts and Dick Freeman. ==Notable members== The '''The X-Rated Critics Organization''' membership features key adult journalists including: [[Darklady]], [[Gram Ponate]] and Dan Miller, Editor of [[AVN (magazine)|AVN]]. ==References== {{reflist|2}} ==External links== *[http://www.xrco.com/ XRCO.com] - Official Homepage *[http://www.944.com/nightsites/gallery/xrco-awards-x-rated-critics-org/ 2009 XRCO Award Show Photos] *[http://www.freepornstarpix.com/xrco_arrivals/ 2006 XRCO Award Show Photos] *[http://www.avn.com/printFriendly.cfm?objectID=DB7CFB9A-920B-850D-13C02ABC3A0ECBFD&sitesection=video AVN.com] â€“ XRCO 2006 Nominations *[http://www.imdb.com/Sections/Awards/X-Rated_Critics_Organization_USA/ IMDb: X-Rated Critics Organization, USA] [[Category:Sex industry in the United States]] [[Category:Organizations established in 1984]]
